title: VIP组权限
author: 人民币，
txt_content:
default: false
permissions:
- essentials.fly
- plotme.limit.1
- plotme.use 
- essentials.build
inheritance:
- g:essentials_builder
- g:towny_builder
info:
prefix: '&5[V&4I&6P&81]'
build: true inheritance:和 permissions:
suffix: ''
写啥可以拥有 builder组的权

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
- essentials.build
- essentials.sethome
- essentials.home
- essentials.warp
- essentials.spawn
- essentials.tpa
- essentials.tpaccept
- essentials.tpahere
- essentials.hat
- essentials.back复制代码
 以上为权限

replies.author: uuz
replies.txt_content:
不用楼上那么麻烦。

按照你的权限表来看 

你只需要打 /mangaddi vip builder

replies.author: 人民币，
replies.txt_content:
uuz 发表于 2014-2-20 19:31
不用楼上那么麻烦。

按照你的权限表来看 
骚年 有了，你没看见么

replies.author: uuz
replies.txt_content:
哦   我怎么没看见inheritance:下有 builder ? 

如果你仅仅是说的 - g:essentials_builder  那么你还是按照我上面告诉你的那一条命令老实打一次吧

不然你builder添加的新的权限vip用户组是不会继承的
